game.engine.stage

Class CanvasStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • game.engine.stage.CanvasStage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stage, ClockListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class CanvasStage
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements Stage
    Stage using Canvas for drawing. If supported draws images using page flipping.
    Before using this you should test it. With some JVM implementations this will fail.
    Author:
    Marvin Bruns
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void tick(long frames,
        long coveredTime)
        Description copied from interface: ClockListener
        A new tick occurred. Do your time based work. A clock will call this method from a thread. Think of synchronization etc.
        Specified by:
        tick in interface ClockListener
        Parameters:
        frames - Full frames covered by this tick
        coveredTime - Time covered by the full frames (nanoseconds)
